sub_title: Teacher Dutch Language & Culture. People's person, writer, traveller.
summary:
Highly educated and professional self-employed Dutch linguist.

I founded my own business -  joinwords - in 2011, to help companies and individuals with my excellent copywriting and translation skills. 

Copywriting, translation and transcreation professional.

With my business joinwords, I provide:
* attractive, well-written Dutch texts for advertorials, mailings, brochures, flyers, blogs, websites etc. The start-point is a clear understanding of the target-audience. I add  creativity, to-the-point sentences and accuracy to get to the end-point: reader-friendly, meaningful content.   
* English & German into Dutch and Dutch into English translation, editing and proofreading services. 
* transcreation projects, by combining translation and copywriting skills. 

Professional and personal skills.

I have an international focus and obtained international leading experience and track record. I also possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills. I have a professional attitude and am a conscientious, committed multitasker who is able to prioritise and used to deadlines. I am driven, keen to learn and widely interested. I am a people's person and enjoy writing, travelling, reading and sports in my spare time.

If you are seeking a driven, inspired Dutch linguist to help with copywriting and/or translation tasks, please e-mail: roelien@joinwords.com.
